author: Simon Difford
description: The wine adds complexity to this simple grape cocktail - hence "Double" Grape Martini.
name: Double Grape Martini
recipeIngredient: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE grapes in base of shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
